00041 ServerKeepaliveHandler::ServerKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, Master *master)
00042   : m_comm(comm), m_master(master) {
00043   int error;
00044 
00045   m_master->get_datagram_send_address(&m_send_addr);
00046 
00047   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00048     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00049     exit(1);
00050   }
00051 
00052   return;
00053 }

00060 void ServerKeepaliveHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event) {
00061   int error;
00062 
00063   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00064     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00065     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00066 
00067     try {
00068 
00069       // sanity check command code
00070       if (event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00071         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00072                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00073 
00074       switch (event->header.command) {
00075       case Protocol::COMMAND_KEEPALIVE: {
00076           SessionDataPtr session_ptr;
00077 
00078           uint64_t session_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00079           uint64_t last_known_event = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00080           bool shutdown = decode_bool(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00081 
00082           if (shutdown) {
00083             m_master->destroy_session(session_id);
00084             return;
00085           }
00086 
00087           if (session_id == 0) {
00088             session_id = m_master->create_session(event->addr);
00089             HT_INFOF("Session handle %llu created", (Llu)session_id);
00090             error = Error::OK;
00091           }
00092           else
00093             error = m_master->renew_session_lease(session_id);
00094 
00095           if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION) {
00096             HT_INFOF("Session handle %llu expired", (Llu)session_id);
00097             CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(session_id,
00098                            Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION));
00099             if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(event->addr, m_send_addr, cbp))
00100                 != Error::OK) {
00101               HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s",
00102                         Error::get_text(error));
00103             }
00104             return;
00105           }
00106 
00107           if (!m_master->get_session(session_id, session_ptr)) {
00108             HT_ERRORF("Unable to find data for session %llu", (Llu)session_id);
00109             return;
00110           }
00111 
00112           session_ptr->purge_notifications(last_known_event);
00113 
00119           CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(
00120                          session_ptr));
00121           if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(event->addr, m_send_addr, cbp))
00122               != Error::OK) {
00123             HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s",
00124                       Error::get_text(error));
00125           }
00126         }
00127         break;
00128       default:
00129         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00130                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00131       }
00132     }
00133     catch (Exception &e) {
00134       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00135     }
00136   }
00137   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00138 
00139     m_master->remove_expired_sessions();
00140 
00141     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00142       HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00143       exit(1);
00144     }
00145 
00146   }
00147   else {
00148     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00149   }
00150 }

00156 void ServerKeepaliveHandler::deliver_event_notifications(uint64_t session_id) {
00157   int error = 0;
00158   SessionDataPtr session_ptr;
00159 
00160   //HT_INFOF("Delivering event notifications for session %lld", session_id);
00161 
00162   if (!m_master->get_session(session_id, session_ptr)) {
00163     HT_ERRORF("Unable to find data for session %llu", (Llu)session_id);
00164     return;
00165   }
00166 
00172   CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(session_ptr));
00173   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(session_ptr->addr, m_send_addr, cbp))
00174       != Error::OK) {
00175     HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00176   }
00177 
00178 }
